title: Touch and go
creator_credit: Peter Maxwell, John Pellatt and Maxwell-Pellatt
brief_description: Comedy about six women who take to a life of crime in order to aid their favourite charitable causes. Stars Wendy Hughes, Chantal Cantouri, Carmen Duncan and Jon English and features a script by Peter Yeldham.
description: Comedy about six women who take to a life of crime in order to aid their favourite charitable causes. Stars Wendy Hughes, Chantal Cantouri, Carmen Duncan and Jon English and features a script by Peter Yeldham.
